nodeFlavour.name: Yavin
nodeFlavour.flavourText: A large gas planet

nodeFlavour.name: Shire
nodeFlavour.flavourText: Small village full of hobbits

nodeFlavour.name: Bulguard
nodeFlavour.flavourText: An original place

nodeFlavour.name: Baldur's Gate
nodeFlavour.flavourText: Large city with plenty of adventure

nodeFlavour.name: Giant's Nest
nodeFlavour.flavourText: Something smells really awful here...

nodeFlavour.name: Eagle Point
nodeFlavour.flavourText: Looks like this place was once a scouting facility of some sort.

nodeFlavour.name: Fraglor
nodeFlavour.flavourText: The conditions on may not be ideal, but very promising. If nothing else, it would be perfect as a new home.

nodeFlavour.name: Xerthor
nodeFlavour.flavourText: The conditions are violent, but it is a violence that is strangely beautiful, yet eerily frightening.

nodeFlavour.name: Klewam
nodeFlavour.flavourText: The coral underwater are perhaps more astonishing than the organisms on the surface, which is because they look almost the same, especially from a distance.

nodeFlavour.name: Gostag
nodeFlavour.flavourText: It looks like some sort of fragmented element is scattered all across this area.

nodeFlavour.name: Arekgir
nodeFlavour.flavourText: Mystery is glowing in the distance.

nodeFlavour.name: Kestuythea
nodeFlavour.flavourText: Looks like someone else might have been here before us.

nodeFlavour.name: Leclurn
nodeFlavour.flavourText: So. Much. FLOWERS!

nodeFlavour.name: Ehiri
nodeFlavour.flavourText: If only this place had a bar.

nodeFlavour.name: Foruta
nodeFlavour.flavourText: Aturof?

nodeFlavour.name: Whabezuno
nodeFlavour.flavourText: welcome to Whazvenoru? Whazuben? WHAT IS THIS!?

nodeFlavour.name: Thecunus
nodeFlavour.flavourText: More like The Cocunuts! No? ... oh well.

nodeFlavour.name: Drurn
nodeFlavour.flavourText: This place sounds like it was made by dwarves of old.

nodeFlavour.name: Cubrippe
nodeFlavour.flavourText: Many creatures seems to be huddling up in a pile.

nodeFlavour.name: Efleon
nodeFlavour.flavourText: Ever played pokemon? This sure sounds like one!

nodeFlavour.name: Chilia
nodeFlavour.flavourText: Ye. There is Chili EVERYWHERE!

nodeFlavour.name: Thion
nodeFlavour.flavourText: This place has no flavour.
